sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-restaurant-list', templateUrl: './restaurant-list.component.html', }) export class RestaurantListComponent implements OnInit { restaurants: any[] = []; ngOnInit(): void { this.restaurants = [ { name: 'The Cozy Corner', location: 'MG Road', cuisine: 'Italian' }, { name: 'Spice Heaven', location: 'Brigade Road', cuisine: 'Indian' }, { name: 'Sushi World', location: 'Koramangala', cuisine: 'Japanese' } ]; } }
